description: This demo focuses on management plane services
covers: Receive heartbeat from standard service instance

step1.description: import Postman environments and collections by raw content into Postman. To get raw content of each collection or environment, run shell commands

step2.description: start a service instance that serves as service management plane
shellCommands: docker container run -it -p 8080:8080 --env WEAVE_PROFILE=management-plane --env WEAVE_NAMESPACE=demo --env WEAVE_APPLICATION=mp0 aftersound/weave:bundle

step3.description: try the services under Postman Collection 'mp0: services (use Environment mp0@8080)'
